title: The 18 Best Matching Sweatsuit & Lounge Sets To Live In Year-Round
description: As much as we love diving headfirst into the latest fashion trends, there’s no denying the magnetic pull of a matching sweatsuit or lounge set. They’re cozy, they’re comfy, they’re cute — and, when made with quality and care, they’re built to last. Plus, the versatility. Toeing the line between sporty athleisure and polished co-ords, sweatsuits are the ultimate shortcut to looking casual yet put-together. Throw one on when you can't be bothered to style an outfit. Or default to your favorite when tackling a week’s worth of chores in a few hours. Working remotely and need to feel slightly more “dressed” than your pajamas? Problem solved. And on travel days? Sweat sets are an MVP for curling up on chilly flights. Bonus: You can break up a set and wear each piece separately, unlocking endless mix-and-match potential for those moments when you actually want to plan an outfit.If you’re ready to retire those ratty, holey sweats that have seen you through college and countless days under your duvet (no judgment — we’ve all got that pair), consider yourself covered. Ahead, discover 18 top-quality, stylish sweatsuit sets from retailers we love and trust. Whether you’re looking for lightweight short sets and breathable cotton co-ords for warm weather or weighty and more structured layers for indoor hibernation mode, you’ll find your new go-to right here.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.LululemonA Lululemon set for travel just makes sense. The plush fleece, roomy fit, and pockets make it practical yet undeniably cozy on early-morning flights — no wonder these are an internet sensation. Plus, the pants come in short, regular, and tall sizes, making the set even more versatile.Lululemon Scuba Oversized Full-Zip Hoodie, $, available at LululemonLululemon Scuba Mid-Rise Oversized Jogger, $, available at LululemonFree-est We’re long-time fans of Free People’s lounge and activewear offerings (especially FP Movement and Free-est), and this knit set is a standout. Available in 10 colors, from easy neutrals to pretty pastels, it’s perfect for everything from at-home happy hour to beach days.free-est Malibu Solid Surf Set, $, available at Free PeopleQuinceA highly searched and top-rated set by Quince that we love in airy white, but also comes in four other shades.Quince SuperSoft Fleece Crew, $, available at QuinceQuince SuperSoft Fleece Cropped Wide Leg Pants, $, available at QuinceNegativeIf you haven’t tried Negative’s ready-to-wear, it’s time. author: Esther Newman
excerpt: These 18 stylish sweatsuits and lounge sets are so comfy, you won’t want to take them off — nor do you need to, with plenty of lightweight, breathable cotton and shorts options for summer. If you've been looking for a do-it-all vacation outfit, then look no further. These sets are perfect for traveling in and chilling in.

Throw one on when you can't be bothered to style an outfit. Or default to your favorite when tackling a week’s worth of chores in a few hours. Working remotely and need to feel slightly more “dressed” than your pajamas? Problem solved. And on travel days? Sweat sets are an MVP for curling up on chilly flights. Bonus: You can break up a set and wear each piece separately, unlocking endless mix-and-match potential for those moments when you actually want to plan an outfit.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

If you’re ready to retire those ratty, holey sweats that have seen you through college and countless days under your duvet (no judgment — we’ve all got that pair), consider yourself covered. Ahead, discover 18 top-quality, stylish sweatsuit sets from retailers we love and trust. Whether you’re looking for lightweight short sets and breathable cotton co-ords for warm weather or weighty and more structured layers for indoor hibernation mode, you’ll find your new go-to right here.

All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.

1 of 17

Lululemon

A Lululemon set for travel just makes sense. The plush fleece, roomy fit, and pockets make it practical yet undeniably cozy on early-morning flights — no wonder these are an internet sensation. Plus, the pants come in short, regular, and tall sizes, making the set even more versatile.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

3 of 17

Quince

A highly searched and top-rated set by Quince that we love in airy white, but also comes in four other shades.

4 of 17

Negative

If you haven’t tried Negative’s ready-to-wear, it’s time. Their layering tees are perfection, but when it comes to matching sweats, this ballet pink waffle set is choice. It even comes with a coordinating bra.

5 of 17

Gap

Readers have been loving Gap’s sweats of late, and these heather gray coordinates make everything from WFH sessions to grocery runs and travel days a little cozier. 

6 of 17

Old Navy

Don’t come for us by being utterly obsessed with ‘90s brown tones like this “black coffee” hue.

7 of 17

Daily Practice

Get your country club aesthetic on in this teal blue set from Anthropologie’s best-selling lounge line.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

8 of 17

Hollister

Gray sweats feel anything but drab when literally tied with a pretty-in-pink satin bow.

9 of 17

Zara

Swingy shapes in dusty pink scream low-key beach day to us, yeah?

10 of 17

Lunya

 

Consider us in when reversible is part of the equation. And this powder blue? So fresh for summer.

11 of 17

Edikted

Girly bows and butter yellow?  We couldn’t click “add to cart” fast enough.

12 of 17

H&M

You just can’t beat a melange gray sweatsuit in rotation, any time of year.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

13 of 17

Aritzia

Of course, everyone's favorite shop for wardrobe basics has hoodies that "hoodie" better than most in existence. The Cozy Fleece fabric is like wearing a cloud, and this pale pink? So adorable.

14 of 17

Lou & Grey

 
Sun-faded shades epitomize summer — this rosemary set is an especially great pick if you’re not into punchier tones.

15 of 17

Aviator Nation

We love a summer stripe, especially in zippy neon.

16 of 17

Splendid

Found: your ultimate set for seaside days.

17 of 17

Jenni Kayne

Jenni Kayne — a.k.a. everyone's favorite luxury knitwear designer —  brings the same softness to the label’s matching sweat sets. This one is the definition of low-key luxury.
